issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Attribute `importantForAutofill` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 22)
This method should only be accessed from tests or within private scope
This Handler class should be static or leaks might occur (anonymous android.os.Handler)
Use `new SparseArray<Integer>>(...)` instead for better performance
Set `android:baselineAligned="false"` on this element for better performance
Nested weights are bad for performance
Nested weights are bad for performance
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@color/browser_overlay_background` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/AppTheme`)

issue.message: Missing the following drawables in `drawable-xhdpi`: tile_youtube.png (found in drawable-xxxhdpi)
Missing density variation folders in `src/main/res`: drawable-hdpi, drawable-mdpi, drawable-xxhdpi
App is not indexable by Google Search; consider adding at least one Activity with an ACTION-VIEW intent filter. See issue explanation for more details.
